column4: help: hey, any of you guys known how to fix some flash+pulseaudio issue? I can't listen to youtube videos when I'm listenning to music...
you can hear both if you use alsa instead of pulseaudio
I liked ALSA, but pulseaudio is the default now and everybody should play nice with it
I hate pulseaudio, but it is that kind of change that you can't fight
